Package com.w10.risk_game.utils.loggers

Class LogEntryBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.utils.loggers.LogEntryBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable
    public class LogEntryBuffer
extends Object
implements Observable
    The LogEntryBuffer class is a singleton implementation that acts as a buffer for log entries and notifies observers when new log entries are added.
    Author:
    Sherwyn Dsouza
